description:
Various external works to the Finsbury Estate, specifically security and lighting treatment to entrance areas, upgraded door and staircase access and new conciege area at Michael Cliffe House. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  FINAA0210, FINAA211, FINAA0212,                         FINAA0201, FINAA0230, FINAA0231,                         FINAAD232, FINAA023, FINAA0240,                         FINA0041, FINAA0242, FINAA0243,                         properties sketch 1-4, FINAB0101,                         FINAA0203, PLD Rev.1
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
